title: Do you know what typefaces these are?
content:
Does anyone know which two typefaces are used in the Centrefold magazine?

[http://centrefoldmagazine.blogspot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404152508/http:/centrefoldmagazine.blogspot.com/ "http://centrefoldmagazine.blogspot.com/")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Centrefold.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404152508/http:/typophile.com/files/Centrefold.jpg) | 13.33 KB |
author: tingeling

comments.content:
CENTRE looks like [Perla](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404152508/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-alias/perla/) by Gareth Hague.

- Mike Yanega

CENTRE could be [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404152508/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100004), and FOLD merely [Helvetica Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404152508/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/bold/).
